channel.title: 2 issues[allstar]
channel.description:
Hello,
so this is my issue. I tried adding the 'minigame' assault on my allstar. And everything seemed to work. The shop where you buy items with your points, killing the npcs[ids of 253 or 258] will give you either 1 or 3 points. But my points aren't saving, if I kill a npc it will save in my moreinfo file as you can see here:
[MOREINFO] character-clueid = 0 character-cluelevel = 0 character-cluestage = 0 character-lastlogin = 127.0.0.1 character-lastlogintime = 20140206 character-starter = 0 character-pkpoints = 0 character-killcount = 0 character-deathcount = 0 character-ancients = 1 character-hasegg = 0 character-hasset = 0 character-mutedate = 0 character-assault = 1 character-bankpin = 0 character-height = 0
but whenever i relog it will change into 0 again.
here are my codes:
http://pastebin.com/JCCr7Mnm
And my second issue:
My pkz(); doesn't seem to work and i really don't know why... Here's the void
http://pastebin.com/ACHtiAqN
thanks

item.title: 2 issues[allstar]
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

For the first issue: Sounds like you’re not loading it from your playerfile, and thus it resets back to 0. Can you show us/me the loading/saving?

Thank you. I indeed didn’t load it of my playerfile. I got it fixed now

Read full topic

item.title: 2 issues[allstar]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

For the first issue: Sounds like you’re not loading it from your playerfile, and thus it resets back to 0. Can you show us/me the loading/saving?

item.title: 2 issues[allstar]
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

Hello,

so this is my issue. I tried adding the ‘minigame’ assault on my allstar. And everything seemed to work. The shop where you buy items with your points, killing the npcs[ids of 253 or 258] will give you either 1 or 3 points. But my points aren’t saving, if I kill a npc it will save in my moreinfo file as you can see here:

[MOREINFO]
character-clueid = 0
character-cluelevel = 0
character-cluestage = 0
character-lastlogin = 127.0.0.1
character-lastlogintime = 20140206
character-starter = 0
character-pkpoints = 0
character-killcount = 0
character-deathcount = 0
character-ancients = 1
character-hasegg = 0
character-hasset = 0
character-mutedate = 0
character-assault = 1
character-bankpin = 0
character-height = 0

but whenever i relog it will change into 0 again.

here are my codes:

http://pastebin.com/JCCr7Mnm

And my second issue:

My pkz(); doesn’t seem to work and i really don’t know why… Here’s the void

http://pastebin.com/ACHtiAqN

thanks
